p: For the quantification of the phytochemical marker d‐limonene in mandarin oil the Applicant submitted a GC‐FID method based on the corresponding standard ISO 3528:2012 for ‘Essential oil of mandarin, Italian type (Citrus reticulate Blanco)’. The quantification is performed using the normalisation approach for the estimation of the area percentage of individual components. For mandarin oil, the Applicant presented a chromatogram and the specific analytical procedure for the analysis of the d‐limonene in mandarin oil.
